content.text: I am great, how are you?
Doing good! I am a big fan of Blues music, who are your favorite artists?
Nice! I like a lot of blues artists but I'd have to say John Lee Hooker is my favorite.
I've heard of him but never listened to his music. I will have to check him out.
You should, he's great! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time outdoors, hiking, camping, fishing. I also like to play music. I dance to Prince songs for an hour every day.
That's awesome! I love spending time outdoors too. I go for a walk with my dogs every day. My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
I love Thanksgiving too! I love spending time with my family and friends and eating delicious food. I'm from Texas, where are you from?
I'm from Russia. I moved to the United States when I was 10 years old.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to visit Russia.
You should, it's a beautiful country.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you like it here in the United States
